# Load Data

```{r create_df_list Function, echo = TRUE}
#' Creates list with dataframes as elements for all CSVs in inpath
#' 
#' @param inpath Path to directory containing CSVs to load
#' 
#' @return df_list. List of dataframes, each from a different CSV
create_df_list <- function(inpath){
  
  # Get all csv files in inpath
  files <- dir(inpath, pattern = "*.csv")
  
  # Read in all the files, appending the path before the filename
  df_list <- files %>%
    map(~ read_csv(file.path(inpath, .), show_col_types = FALSE))
  
  return(df_list)
  
  }
```

### calculate_GLUE_transect_AI

```{r calculate_GLUE_transect_AI, Function, echo = TRUE}
#' Description goes here...
#' 
#' V3 of the Aridity Index Available at: 
#' https://cgiarcsi.community/2019/01/24/global-aridity-index-and-potential-evapotranspiration-climate-database-v3/
#' 
#' 


calculate_GLUE_transect_AI <- function(df, raster_path, data_out){
	
	# Get city name
	city <- df %>% pull(City) %>% unique()
	
	# Add fake coordinates for missing data
	df <- df %>% 
		mutate(Population_Longitude = ifelse(is.na(Population_Longitude), -999, Population_Longitude),
					 Population_Latitude = ifelse(is.na(Population_Latitude), -999, Population_Latitude))
	
	# Load in raster for country
	raster <- raster::raster(AI_raster_path)
	
	# Create spatial point dataframe from latitude and longitude
	spdf <- SpatialPointsDataFrame(
		coords = df %>%
			dplyr::select(Population_Longitude, Population_Latitude), 
		proj4string = raster@crs, 
		data = df
		)
	
	# Calculate aridity index data for population
	Aridity_Index_data <- raster::extract(x = raster, y = spdf, method = "simple")
	
	# Add column with Aridity_Index values
	df_out <- df %>% 
		mutate(Aridity_Index = Aridity_Index_data,
					 Aridity_Index = ifelse(Aridity_Index == 255, NA, Aridity_Index))
	
	# Add unique identifier to the data
	df_out$UID <- paste(df_out$City, df_out$Population, sep = ".")
		
	# Reorganize the data
	df_out <- df_out %>%
		dplyr::select(UID, Country, City, Aridity_Index)
	
	write_csv(df_out, paste0(data_out, city, "_AI.csv"))
	
	}
```

### calculate_points_transects_AI

```{r calculate_points_transects_AI Function, echo = TRUE}
#' Description goes here...
#' 
#' V3 of the Aridity Index Available at: 
#' https://cgiarcsi.community/2019/01/24/global-aridity-index-and-potential-evapotranspiration-climate-database-v3/
#' 
#' 


calculate_points_transects_AI <- function(df, raster_path, data_out){

	# Get city name
	city <- df %>% pull(City) %>% unique()
	
	# Add fake coordinates for missing data
	df <- df %>%
		mutate(Longitude = ifelse(is.na(Longitude), -999, Longitude),
					 Latitude = ifelse(is.na(Latitude), -999, Latitude))
	
	# Load in raster for country
	raster <- raster::raster(AI_raster_path)
	
	# Create spatial point dataframe from latitude and longitude
	spdf <- SpatialPointsDataFrame(
		coords = df %>% 
			dplyr::select(Longitude, Latitude), 
		proj4string = raster@crs, 
		data = df
		)
	
	# Calculate aridity indexx data for population
	Aridity_Index_data <- raster::extract(x = raster, y = spdf, method = "simple")
	
	# Add column with Aridity_Index values
	df_out <- df %>% 
		mutate(Aridity_Index = Aridity_Index_data,
					 Aridity_Index = ifelse(Aridity_Index == 255, NA, Aridity_Index))
	
	# Reorganize the data
	df_out <- df_out %>%
		dplyr::select(UID, Country, City, Aridity_Index)
	
	write_csv(df_out, paste0(data_out, city, "_AI.csv"))
	
	}
```

# Calculate Aridity Index

```{r Calculate Aridity_Index Data, echo = TRUE, results = "hide"}
## Set inpath for raw Aridity_Index raster dataset
AI_raster_path <- "raster_files/AI_rasters/ai_v3_yr.tif"


## Set data_out for aridity index data
# GLUE transects
data_out_1 <- "data/AI_data/GLUE_transects_AI/"
# Random points
data_out_2 <- "data/AI_data/random_points_AI/"
# Systematic points
data_out_3 <- "data/AI_data/systematic_points_AI/"
# Random transects
data_out_4 <- "data/AI_data/random_transects_AI/"


## Calculate the aridity index for each site across all sampling types
# GLUE transects
purrr::walk(
	GLUE.transects.df.list,
	calculate_GLUE_transect_AI, 
	raster_path = AI_raster_path,
	data_out = data_out_1
	)
# Random points
purrr::walk(
	random.points.df.list,
	calculate_points_transects_AI,
	raster_path = AI_raster_path,
	data_out = data_out_2
	)
# Systematic points
purrr::walk(
	systematic.points.df.list,
	calculate_points_transects_AI,
	raster_path = AIx_raster_path,
	data_out = data_out_3
	)
# Random transects
purrr::walk(
	random.transects.df.list,
	calculate_points_transects_AI,
	raster_path = AI_raster_path,
	data_out = data_out_4
	)
```
